value.verse:
I will exalt you, O LORD,
because you have lifted me up *
value.halfverse: and have not let my enemies triumph over me.

value.verse: O LORD my God, I cried out to you, *
value.halfverse: and you restored me to health.

value.verse: You brought me up, O LORD, from the dead; *
value.halfverse: you restored my life as I was going down to the grave.
give thanks for the remembrance of his holiness.
value.verse: Sing to the LORD, you servants of his; *
For his wrath endures but the twinkling of an eye, *

value.halfverse: but joy comes in the morning.
You, LORD, with your favor, made me as strong as the mountains.”
value.verse:
While I felt secure, I said,
“I shall never be disturbed. *

value.halfverse: and I was filled with fear.

value.verse: I cried to you, O LORD; *
value.halfverse: I pleaded with the Lord, saying,
will the dust praise you or declare your faithfulness?
value.verse: “What profit is there in my blood, if I go down to the Pit? *
Hear, O LORD, and have mercy upon me; *

value.halfverse: you have put off my sack-cloth and clothed me with joy.
value.verse: You have turned my wailing into dancing; *

value.halfverse: O LORD my God, I will give you thanks for ever.
value.verse: Therefore my heart sings to you without ceasing; *
